title: Slow Cooker Pineapple Brisket
directions: Toss the chopped pineapple, vinegar, coconut aminos, garlic, salt, turmeric, honey & water into a bowl.
You can either mix everything up OR you can throw your stick blender in that bowl of awesomeness and blend it up a little. I blended!
Lay the chopped onion at the bottom of your Slow Cooker
Place the meat on top of the onions fat side up
Pour your pineapple mix on top of the meat
Take you meat out and shred it
